name: FilterChip

properties.name: columnName
properties.description: The name of the column that this filter is applied to.
properties.rawdescription: The name of the column that this filter is applied to.

properties.name: displayValue
properties.description: The value that the chip will display in the dropdown.
properties.rawdescription: The value that the chip will display in the dropdown.

properties.name: externalFilterQuery
properties.description: An optional property that holds the form value taken from the column configuration.
properties.rawdescription: An optional property that holds the form value taken from the column configuration.

properties.name: filteringConfig
properties.description: An optional property that holds the formly filtering configuration for the column that this filter is applied to.
properties.rawdescription: An optional property that holds the formly filtering configuration for the column that this filter is applied to.

properties.name: filterPredicate
properties.description: An optional property that holds a string to search for.
properties.rawdescription: An optional property that holds a string to search for.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Optional label that will be displayed if filter chips are separated into multiple groups.
properties.rawdescription: Optional label that will be displayed if filter chips are separated into multiple groups.

properties.name: path
properties.description: An optional property that holds the path to the chip value in the externalFilterQuery.
properties.rawdescription: An optional property that holds the path to the chip value in the externalFilterQuery.

properties.name: remove
properties.description: An optional function to remove this filter from the column. If not provided will set default removal function that will reduce the external query by removing the object that is resolved by the path set in the FilterChip. The returned object may also include additional properties defined by the FilterChip type as partials.
properties.rawdescription:
An optional function to remove this filter from the column.
If not provided will set default removal function that will reduce the external query by removing the object that is resolved by the path set in the FilterChip.
The returned object may also include additional properties defined by the `FilterChip` type as partials.

jsdoctags.comment: An object defined by the FilterChip type, including the columnName and updated externalFilterQuery or 'filterPredicate' properties. The returned object may also include additional properties defined by the FilterChip type as partials.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The actual value that the chip will hold. It can be just a string or a more complex object like {id: 123, name: Test, value: test}.
properties.rawdescription:
The actual value that the chip will hold.
It can be just a string or a more complex object like
{id: 123, name: Test, value: test}.

description: Defines an interface for a filter chip object, which represents a filter applied to a column.
rawdescription: Defines an interface for a filter chip object, which represents a filter applied to a column.
